publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2370# Donald Gorrie: Battlefieldsâ€”That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Executive should undertake archaeological research to establish the correct site of the Battle of Bannockburn and that sites of this and other important Scottish battlefields should be safeguarded from further development. Supported by: Robert Brown*, Tavish Scott*, Nora Radcliffe*, Ian Jenkins*, Margaret Smith*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Mike Rumbles*, John Farquhar Munro*
S1M-2370# Battlefields (lodged on 25 October 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Robin Harper*
S1M-2370# Battlefields (lodged on 25 October 2001) Michael Russell*
S1M-2370# Battlefields (lodged on 25 October 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2370# Battlefields (lodged on 25 October 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2370# Battlefields (lodged on 25 October 2001) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
